name: Mafia vs Police - Age of Crime
name_original: Mafia vs Police - Age of Crime
description:
MAFIA VS POLICE: AGE OF CRIME is an exciting game of logic where players decide how the Mafia expands and how the Police grow to stop them. Become the Godfather or Secretary of Security, and maybe even someone higher! Plan every move carefully, for you alone decide whether the Mafia or the Police end up running the city.
Gangsters band together in crime syndicates and launder their dirty money in bars and casinos, while the Police and FBI try and jam them up and send them to prison. But the real action is at the top of the food chain, where problems are solved between mafia bosses, godfathers, police chiefs, and ministers! Help the gangsters group up, or instead try and increase police authority.
Be careful! Don't lose control of what's happening!
Game features:
Realistic mafia and police structures
Lively and realistic characters
Beautiful user-friendly interface
Simple and clear gameplay
The option to share your achievements
Top players!
